description: This example of a Group Resource is referenced from an example in the EBMonFHIR Implementation Guide. This example shows a definitional value for the membership element and a person value for the type element.

valueCodeableConcept.text: Pneumonia may be diagnosed by lower respiratory tract symptoms and either or both of radiographic infiltrate or need for oxygen support

coding.display: Pneumonia caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)
